grails-app.taglib
Class NimbleAuthTagLib

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.taglib.NimbleAuthTagLib

class NimbleAuthTagLib

Provides authentication related tags to the Nimble application

author:
Bradley Beddoes

Property Summary
def authenticated

A synonym for 'isLoggedIn'.

def facebookConnect

def facebookService

def hasAllRoles

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user has all the given roles (inversion of lacksAnyRole).

def hasAnyRole

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user has any of the given roles (inversion of lacksAllRoles).

def hasPermission

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user has the given permission.

def hasRole

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user has the given role.

def isAdministrator

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is an administrator

def isLoggedIn

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is logged in.

def isNotLoggedIn

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is not logged in.

def lacksAllRoles

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user doesn't have all of the given roles (inversion of hasAnyRole).

def lacksAnyRole

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user has none of the given roles (inversion of hasAllRoles).

def lacksPermission

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user does not have the given permission.

def lacksRole

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user does not have the given role.

static def namespace

def notAuthenticated

A synonym for 'isNotLoggedIn'.

def notRemembered

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is not remembered from a previous session (via the "remember me" cookie).

def notUser

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is neither logged in nor remembered from a previous session (via the "remember me" cookie).

def principal

Provides markup that renders the username of the logged in user

def principalLink

Provides markup that renders a link to the administrative view of the logged in principal

def principalName

Provides markup the renders the name of the logged in user

def remembered

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is remembered from a previous session (via the "remember me" cookie) but not currently logged in.

def user

This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is either logged in or remembered from a previous session (via the "remember me" cookie).

 
Constructor Summary
NimbleAuthTagLib()

 
Method Summary
private boolean checkAuthenticated()

private boolean checkPermission(java.lang.String target)

Determine if the user currently has referenced target as a WildcardPermission, does not deal with any other type of permission.

private boolean checkRole(def attrs)

Checks whether the current user has the role specified in the given tag attributes.

 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
wait, wait, wait, hashCode, getClass, equals, toString, notify, notifyAll

def authenticated
A synonym for 'isLoggedIn'. This is the same name as used by the standard JSecurity tag library.

namespace

static def namespace

notAuthenticated

def notAuthenticated
A synonym for 'isNotLoggedIn'. This is the same name as used by the standard JSecurity tag library.

notRemembered

def notRemembered
This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is not remembered from a previous session (via the "remember me" cookie). This is the case if they are a guest user or logged in.

notUser

def notUser
This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is neither logged in nor remembered from a previous session (via the "remember me" cookie).

principal

def principal
Provides markup that renders the username of the logged in user

principalLink

def principalLink
Provides markup that renders a link to the administrative view of the logged in principal

principalName

def principalName
Provides markup the renders the name of the logged in user

remembered

def remembered
This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is remembered from a previous session (via the "remember me" cookie) but not currently logged in.

user

def user
This tag only writes its body to the output if the current user is either logged in or remembered from a previous session (via the "remember me" cookie).

NimbleAuthTagLib()

 
Method Detail

checkAuthenticated

private boolean checkAuthenticated()

checkPermission

private boolean checkPermission(java.lang.String target)
Determine if the user currently has referenced target as a WildcardPermission, does not deal with any other type of permission.

checkRole

private boolean checkRole(def attrs)
Checks whether the current user has the role specified in the given tag attributes. Returns true if the user has the role, otherwise false.
